characters.name: Andy Dufresne
characters.description: A banker wrongfully convicted of murder who maintains his innocence and dignity while serving a life sentence at Shawshank prison.

personality.behavior_summary: Quiet and introspective banker who never loses hope and uses his intelligence to survive and eventually escape prison.
personality.motivations: To prove his innocence, maintain his dignity, and ultimately gain freedom
personality.character_arc: From devastated prisoner to architect of his own redemption
defining_moments: Playing Mozart over the PA system

characters.name: Ellis Boyd 'Red' Redding
characters.description: A long-term prisoner who has become institutionalized but forms a deep friendship with Andy that gives him hope.

personality.behavior_summary: Prison smuggler and narrator who initially believes hope is dangerous but learns to embrace it through Andy's friendship.
personality.motivations: To survive prison life and eventually find meaning beyond the walls
personality.character_arc: From institutionalized prisoner to free man who chooses hope

characters.name: Warden Samuel Norton
characters.description: The corrupt and hypocritical warden of Shawshank prison who exploits prisoners for personal gain while maintaining a religious facade.

personality.behavior_summary: Uses religion as a cover for his criminal activities and brutally maintains control over the prison.
personality.character_arc: From seemingly righteous warden to exposed criminal
